name: A copper amplifying coil
data: It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users charisma unbelievably much.
It has poor armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration an average amount.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'tonal projection'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'tonal control'.
